messages.subject: New Yahoo group:)
messages.msgSnippet: Hi All, I have been thinking of starting this group for a long time - finally did it! It s for unschoolers aspiring to travel the world:) (sounds pretty
messages.messageBody:
Hi All,

I have been thinking of starting this group for a long time - finally did it! It's for unschoolers aspiring to travel the world:) (sounds pretty ambitious, if I may say so myself!:)

I hope the moderatotors on the lists don't mind me posting this. I have a detailed message about what it is about on the group introduction.
Hope to see many of you there. Feel free to forward it to other unschooling groups you may be on.


http://groups.yahoo.com/group/TRAVULL/

Neha
unschooling mom to ds Nishay 7 and ds Neer 9mo.
